attributes.action: Stop using the e-petition as an excuse for democracy in action
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The e-petition is already leading to people being spammed in attempts to increase the number of signatories, and this will only get worse as the system becomes more widely known. As a means of reflecting genuine public opinion it far less representative than a paper petition and is likely to engender highly misleading results.  It is not an acceptable vehicle for sensible debate on government policies or a good use of taxpayer's money.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
